forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 16C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. Low 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. Low 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
